nodes.text: Corrections officer was the title of an officer in the New Republic Correctional Corps. Lieutenant Davan held the position aboard the New Republic Correctional Transport Bothan-Five.

A corrections officer first appeared in "Chapter 6: The Prisoner," the sixth episode of the first season of Jon Favreau's live-action television series The Mandalorian, which was directed by Rick Famuyiwa and released on December 13, 2019 on Disney+. The position was later identified in Joe Schreiber's junior novelization of The Mandalorian Season One, released in 2021.
